channel.title: Simple client help please!
channel.description: Hey, so on my computer in my basement I have my source and client. And I edited them. I can open my client and play my game on that computer downstairs. So I wanted to see if it would work on other comps so I compressed my client and uploaded it. I then downloaded it onto my other comp. When I click "run" on my client the black Cmd prompt button comes up then very very quickly goes away, and the client does not open. Any help?

item.title: Simple client help please!
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

Ok sweet thanks.
I’ll try that out!

Read full topic

item.title: Simple client help please!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Open up the .bat file and on a blank line at the end of the file, add a “pause” and then run again and post the output.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple client help please!
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

Hey,
so on my computer in my basement I have my source and client. And I edited them. I can open my client and play my game on that computer downstairs. So I wanted to see if it would work on other comps so I compressed my client and uploaded it. I then downloaded it onto my other comp.
When I click “run” on my client the black Cmd prompt button comes up then very very quickly goes away, and the client does not open. Any help?

Read full topic
